Nurham Osbie Warwick (March 5, 1940 â€“ October 21, 2020) was a politician in the American state of North Carolina.[http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/10244/nurham-osbie-warwick#.Uszn8GRDveU Nurham Osbie Warwick's Biography - Project Vote Smart] He served in the North Carolina House of Representatives from 1996 to 2002. He was a retired farmer and educator.
A native of Clinton, North Carolina, he was an alumnus of North Carolina State University. He also did graduate work at University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and Pennsylvania State University.[https://archive.org/stream/northcarolinaman20012002nort#page/594/mode/2up North Carolina manual [serial]] Warwick died at his home in Clinton, North Carolina on October 21, 2020.
